Audio.Locality: Km12, Piste de la Crique Dardanelles, Mana
Audio.Author: Jon King
Audio.Comments: Distance to mic. 10m. Call of male after playback of song, always within 1m of ground. Presumed female also heard giving very similar call in distance, not audible on rec. Old growth lowland forest with history of selective logging.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:yes
